preconditions.precondition: Depositor has access to the platform

mainSequence.step: Auth confirms successful authentication to UI
Depositor requests a familiar interface from UI
UI fetches user preferences from SI
SI requests user-specific settings from UnivSys
UnivSys provides the user settings to SI
SI applies settings and customization to UI
UI requests integration features from SI
SI fetches integration capabilities from UnivSys
UnivSys provides capabilities (APIs, data formats) to SI
UI renders a unified management interface through DMP
DMP indicates the interface is ready to UI
UI displays a familiar and integrated interface to the Depositor
